meanings.sent1: After spinning around too fast, I felt the wooziest I had ever felt.
meanings.sent2: The room started spinning, and I felt wooziest when I stood up too quickly.
meanings.sent3: Trying to walk straight after a dizzying spin made me feel the wooziest.
meanings.sent4: The wooziest sensation enveloped me like a cloud of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The wooziest feeling was like being on a merry-go-round that wouldn't stop.
